column1: '''Legolin''' was the third of [[Gelion]]'s six tributary rivers
column2: that like the others rose among the western slopes of the [[Blue Mountains]]. It flowed swiftly west through [[Ossiriand]] between the [[Thalos]] to the north and the [[Brilthor]] to the south.<ref>{{S|Map}}</ref>  The name Legolin means 'free-running'.
